description:
An orphan young man raised by Dr. http://anidb.net/ch32239 [Kabuto Kenzou], trained to be the pilot of Great Mazinger ever since he was young. At first shown only as a bad-tempered young man with a heart of gold under his hotheadedness, he later develops a strong jealousy against his adoptive brother http://anidb.net/ch5122 [Kabuto Kouji].
Tetsuya served as the main character in Great Mazinger and first appeared in the final episode of Mazinger Z.
He also appears in Violence Jack, where he is brutally killed by the motorcycle gang known as Hell`s Wind. This prompts his lover, http://anidb.net/ch32238 [Honoo Jun], to seek vengeance for him.
name: Tsurugi Tetsuya
